title: Exploding Chickens Guest Lecture, UIC CS 342

bullets.text: Explored the structure of Exploding Chickens, a full-stack web app built using Node.js, MongoDB with 1,250+ games played
Discussed game play, project milestones, full-stack architecture, data schema, websockets, test coverage, and hosted a live demo
Delivered as a full-length guest lecture 3 times to 20-80+ students at University of Illinois Chicago in CS 342: Software Design
